Detailed Description

TableFile - File for reading and using files that have delimited rows of data.

Specifically for R table files and the like.

Definition at line 47 of file TableFile.h.

TableFile::TableFile ( char  delim = '\t',
char  comment = '#',
bool  useRowNames = false,
bool  useColNames = true 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
delim - Character to use for word separator. i.e. ',' or '\t'
comment - Character that comment lines begin with.
useRowNames - Is first column the names of the rows?
useColNames - Is the first row the column headers?
delim - Character to use for word separator. i.e. ',' or '\t'
comment - Character that comment lines begin with.
